string-array.name: question
string-array.item: The Great Wall of China is visible from space with the naked eye.
The Earth has only one natural satellite, known as the Moon.
The Eiffel Tower is located in London.
The human brain stops growing after reaching adulthood.
The Sahara Desert is the largest desert in the world.
The Statue of Liberty was a gift from France to the United States.
The chemical symbol for water is Wt.
The Olympic Games are held every three years.
The human heart has four chambers.
